biotools.summary: DISCo-microbe is an easy-to-use command-line program, for creation of diverse communities of organisms that can be distinguished through next-generation sequencing technology

bioschemas.name: Design of an Identifiable Synthetic Community of Microbes (DISCo-microbe)
